name: WPSyncSheets Lite For Elementor – Elementor Pro Form Google Spreadsheet Addon
author: Creative Werk Designs

sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire wpsyncsheets-elementor folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen (Plugins > Installed Plugins).

You will find WPSyncSheets For Elementor menu in your WordPress admin screen.

For basic usage, have a look at the plugin’s Documentation.
sections.faq:
Why form data isn’t sent to Google Spreadshet or just spinning?

Sometimes it will take some time to add data into the google spreadsheet but if data never show up then, there are following ways to resolved this error:

  1. Revoke token at WPSyncSheets For Elementor Settings Page.
  2. Check the Google Sheets & Google Drive API must be Enable.

Can I reorder/add/edit the sheets header columns in Google Spreadsheets?

These features are include in Pro Version

sections.description:
Elementor Pro Form Google Spreadsheet Addon – one of the best plugin to save your Elementor Pro Form entries within one single Google Spreadsheet. It can easily save your all the entries in single spreadsheets, whenever user will fill up the forms. Admin can also easily create new spreadsheet and new sheet in settings page.

Live Demo | Documentation | Need Support? | Upgrade Pro

What’s Included for Free:

Save Entries – We can easily save all the entries with one Google Spreadsheet to make your enquiries/data effective. Google Spreadsheet can save your entries of your Elementor Form.

New Speadsheets – Once user will select and create new spreadsheet with settings option, it will auto create the new spreadsheet in google drive.

New Sheets – Once user will select and create new spreadsheet with settings option, it will auto create the new spreadsheet and sheets based on the name in settings page.

Freeze Header – User can easily freeze header row (first row) of the sheet with setting page option. It can be access easily also enable/disable whenever we need it.

Entry Protection – Sometimes system cause the issues to sending an email to admin, so we have send your business entries before sending system email to protect your business.

View/Clear/Download Spreadsheet – Get all options in one place. View, Clear and Download your Google Spreadsheet with a single click from the plugin’s Settings page.

WPSyncSheets Lite For Elementor Pro Features

[Pro] Add/Edit/Delete/Reorder Columns – Organize your Google sheets from one place. Add, edit, delete or reorder columns directly from the plugin settings page.

[Pro] Sheet Headers mapping with form fields – Once users have created sheet headers, it will auto create the new on clicking in settings page and map the sheet headers with form fields.

[Pro] Save Files – If your forms will have file fields then it will be automatically save those files within our plugin folder and add link to Google Spreadsheet. We can easily check attachment by single click with Google Spreadsheet entries.

[Pro] Easy Settings – Elementor Pro Form plugin can have function to add action after submit, that can easily add our form entries within Google Spreadsheets. All other plugin settings are one click settings to make it user friendly.

Elementor Forms Google Sheet Connector [Free]

Elementor Pro Form Google Spreadsheet Addon – Plugin has one time settings to connect with your Elementor Form with Google Spreadsheet. Whenever user will fill up the form then it will be automaitcally added new row entry within the Google Spreadsheet as we have configure during the settings.

How to connect Elementor to google spreadsheet?

Whats’ Next

Other useful plugins from WPSyncSheets for sync with Google Spreadsheet.

WPSyncSheets For WooCommerce: WooCommerce Google Spreadsheet Addon – (Import / Export)

WPSyncSheets For Gravity Forms: Gravity Forms Google Spreadsheet Addon – (Import / Export)

WPSyncSheets For Core: WordPress Google Spreadsheet Addon – (Import / Export)

WPSyncSheets For Contact Form 7: Contact Form 7 Google Spreadsheet Addon

WPSyncSheets For WPForms: WPForms Google Spreadsheet Addon

WPSyncSheets For Ninja Forms: Ninja Forms Google Spreadsheet Addon

WPSyncSheets For Fluent Forms: Fluent Forms Google Spreadsheet Addon

WPSyncSheets For Formidable Forms: Formidable Forms Google Spreadsheet Addon

  2. Feed Setting

  3. Google Spreadsheet Entries
sections.reviews:
Great Plugin

By fellipefonseca13 on February 26, 2024

I would like to congratulate you on the excellent plugin and support from the company.

The best plugin ever

By skhatum on March 20, 2023

I recently started using the WPSyncSheets Lite For Elementor plugin on my website, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations. The plugin works perfectly, and it has made my life much easier by automatically syncing all submissions from my website with Google Spreadsheets. The installation process was simple, and the plugin is very user-friendly. I particularly appreciate the fact that it is lightweight and doesn't slow down my website. Overall, I would highly recommend this plugin to anyone looking for a reliable and efficient way to manage their submissions.

Great help from support!

By bartvanwas on November 9, 2021

With a few minor mistakes I made at the setup of this plugin, I really received the best help I could from the support team.

Satisfied User From ElementorSheets

By cjgp1 on December 9, 2020

I was using this plugin when it was still called ElementorSheets. And I still am a satisfied customer from this plugin when I got it at CodeCanyon.net. I am happy to see a Lite version come to the WordPress Plugin Directory, as not all my clients need every feature of the Pro version but I still have clients that do. Seems like there are some bugs seeing that it has made its fresh entry here. I am writing this review to show support for this plugin. Keep up the good work.
